Onemonth.com | New York | https://jobs.lever.co/onemonth

We're hiring for a number of positions including sales, marketing, and software engineers (ruby/rails). We are open to remote for the right candidates.

At One Month We believe that you can transform your life in a minute, a day, and a week. So much can change in just one month by learning skills that actually matter.

Our mission is to change people's lives all over the world by delivering high-quality educational content at a fraction of the cost of traditional universities at scale through the internet.

One Month was started by two teachers and self-learners who worked with thousands of students before deciding to start a company together. Over the years spent learning and teaching, we developed educational tools that give us an advantage in running online classrooms.

Come join us in changing the face of online education.
